example.name: mailinglist-subscribe
example.synopsis: Example for creating a mailing subscription
example.description:
Here we use the email function of WSForm to send an email to a user that has subscribed to a mailing list.

We also create a page in the wiki with this information, so we can find who has to receive emails for the mailing list. We use the option: next_available which finds the next free number in a range (see docs).


The form

See : Example

The template (Title: Mail body for email subscriber)

%ws_to=$email%
%ws_from=webmaster@example.com%
%ws_subject=From our WIKI: Thanks for subscribing to our mailing list%

Dear $name,


Thanks for subscribing to our mailinglist.
You will now receive relevant information on our services .

To unsubscribe click here : CLICK


Best regards,

WSform mailsubscription form


Page that will be created (Title Mailing user:next available number)

{{mailinglist:
|name=name filled in by user
|email=email filled in by user
|subscribe=yes (from the hidden field in the form)}}
